item.title: Tiffany add a quote by George MacDonald
item.description: "To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved." -- George MacDonald

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by George Mac Donald
item.description: "Work is not always required. There is such a thing as sacred idleness." -- George Mac Donald

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by George MacDonald
item.description: "Seeing is not believing - it is only seeing." -- George MacDonald

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by George MacDonald
item.description: "It is by loving and not by being loved that one can come nearest to the soul of another." -- George MacDonald

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by George MacDonald
Tiffany add a quote by George MacDonald
item.description: "Doing the will of God leaves me no time for disputing about His plans." -- George MacDonald

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Dave Barry
item.description: "It is a well-documented fact that guys will not ask for directions. This is a biological thing. This is why it takes several million sperm cells... to locate a female egg, despite the fact that the egg is, relative to them, the size of Wisconsin." -- Dave Barry

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Now the trouble about trying to make yourself stupider than you really are is that you very often succeed." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Dan Baumann
item.description: "Ultimately we have nothing to fear. Jesus loves us, and he invites us to be confident in that love. As we seek to obey Him, we are not called to assess the risk involved and determine whether or not obedience will be beneficial or safe for us. We are simply called to trust and obey." -- Dan Baumann
